[b]Silver:[/b]
{I} is Silver mana, a colored mana source and the sixth color of mana. {I} has its own basic lands, called Faults, and you won't need to draft those.

Before each game starts, move up to seven cards with different names from your sideboard here face-down. These cards are in your sanctum.
Only cards that can start in the sanctum can start here.
If they can start in the sanctum, cards put into your sideboard between games may start the game in your sanctum.
